name: AbZorb (itch) (TJmacyB)
description:
Join Zorb the intergalactic space snail on his adventure to get back the pieces of his portal revolver so he can go back home. 

Collect food items on the way to change his defense, speed, and damage stats and to regain health. 

Healthy food makes you move and shoot faster but do less damage

Unhealthy food makes you take less and do more damage but makes you slower. 

Collecting food restores your hit points.

Collect all the pieces of the portal revolver to finish the game.
